name: Adventures of Captain Cleaner
description:
PLAY IN FULLSCREEN MODE

This is a Ludum Dare 42 Game about a Super Smart Cleaner Software (oh sorry! Its not a SOFTWARE, its a Super Hero). He venture his journey to slay all the trash from the computers to make SPACE for his city to function peacefully.  

Its a 2D platformer where the player's main objective is to swap between your hard drives and clean all the unwanted trash by tricking them into Uninstalling center, while they are following you. Like the Pied Piper of Hamelin.
